task_id.description: the unique ID for this object (auto-created)

workflow_id.description: the ID of the encompassing workflow object (M task directive : 1 workflow)

cluster_locations.description: the HTCondor pool(s) where the taskforce(s) will run

task_image.description: the docker/singularity/apptainer image to run for each event: apptainer images in the directory (sandbox) format will start fastest, all others formats are first converted to such on each worker CPU

task_args.description: the arguments string to pass to the task image

timestamp.description: the time (epoch) when this object was created

input_queues.description: the message queue(s) that this task will use for event input

output_queues.description: the message queue(s) that this task will use for event output
